item.description:
We had success on 2011's Session 1 of the Couch to 5K and now we are on to Session 2 to start all over for newbies who missed out. 

Using the Couch to 5K training from CoolRunning.com, we will be meeting every Monday and Wednesday night at the WEYMOUTH High School track to get ready for 5K's. We will plan a "Graduation" race about a month or so into the training. 

***PLEASE NOTE THE NEW LOCATION!!!*****

If you want to join us for training or if you want to meet us for some company to walk the track or jog at your own pace, the more the merrier! 

We are starting July 11th with week 1 of the training and will be at the track at 6:30pm every Monday and Wednesday night at least into the fall, depending on the weather.  Once and a while people may choose to meetup on Friday's after work or early Saturday mornings to get in the 3rd session each week. Please see below for the fully dated schedule.

I will have a stop watch for the first few weeks when the training is by time.  Then we will move to distance using the 1/4 mile track with each person at their own pace.  Please see the full schedule on link to coolrunning.com for the full training schedule. 

http://www.coolrunning.com/engine/2/2_3/181.shtml

Remember to bring your sneakers and some water!

As you should always remember before beginning any new exercise program, consult with your doctor.  Please review the releases you agreed to by joining meetup originally. 

Monday and Wednesday nights at 6:30pm
WEYMOUTH High School
Track
Meet at the entrance by the bleachers

Organizer: Julie
Min/Max: none

Guests: Welcome!

RSVP Deadline: Please finalize your RSVP by NOON on the day of the event.  Please remember to rsvp.  This is the only way you could be notified if this is canceled for any reason.

Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel. We will train if it is overcast or there is a slight drizzle. Please plan to bring a lightweight jacket with a hood just in case. (We will do my best to notify everyone if this event is canceled by 2pm on the day of the training.)

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Directions: Please see “Directions to Frequently Used Venues” Discussion Thread on the Message Board.

   

Training Week #:   Starting Monday:

Week 1                      July 11th

Week 2                      July 18th

Week 3                      July 25th

Week 4                      August 1st

Week 5                      August 8th

Week 5                           August 15th (repeted, doing session 2)                         

Week 6                      August 22nd

Week 7                      August 29th

Week 8                      September 5th

Week 9                      September 12th

GRADUATION!  September 18th Sunday

Jeff Coombs Memorial Road Race
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet by the track

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Couch to 5K Training, Walkers & Joggers Welcome- Session 2 of 2011!
